snippet: The Latvian soprano Kristine Opolais makes her Met debut in Puccini’s Viennese-style opera “La Rondine.”
abstract: Anthony Tommasini reviews Metropolitan Opera production of Puccini opera La Rondine, starring soprano Kristine Opolais.
lead_paragraph: The Latvian soprano Kristine Opolais makes her Met debut in Puccini’s Viennese-style opera “La Rondine.”

headline.seo: Kristine Opolais Makes Met Debut in Puccini’s ‘Rondine’
headline.main: A Met Debut Helps Elevate Puccini’s Stepchild of an Opera
headline.print_headline: A Met Debut Helps Elevate Puccini’s Stepchild of an Opera
